{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Monster Digital |model=OTG Cloud |upc=849933002329 |fcc_date=6/10/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless storage device |fcc_id=2AAFIMA96 |ic_id=11447A-WCRD3 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196EU |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Chingis Technology |fla1_model=Pm25LQ032-CE1409 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A |jtag= |serial= |expansion_if_types=SDHC, Micro SD, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A Linear Li-Ion Battery Charger;Feeling Technology;FP8102;;1;,,, |flags=battery powered |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=10.10.1.1 |oui=64:BA:BD |oui_eth=64:BA:BD }} [http://monsterdigital.com/collections/wireless/products/otg-cloud Product Page] :[https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0872/6384/files/OTG_Cloud_Advanced_User_s_Manual_v1_041315.pdf?3826444249118058247 User Manual]
Flash: ''PMC'' (now ''Chingis'', part of ''ISSI'') Pm25LQ032 4MB (32Mb) :''Chingis Technology'' PM25LQ032 [http://www.chingistek.com/img/Product_Files/Pm25LQ032C%20datasheet%20v1.6.1.pdf Datasheet] :newer generation flash, with 4KB sectors and 32KB blocks
